GuideContent.description: Before install Squiid Graany There is some steps that you need to follow at first, follow this quick guide.
As you may know Squiid is a Graany game so to play it you need at first install Squid Graany App Go to Play store and search for Squid Graany.
Now Click Install (If you have Roblox already installed skip this step)
